name: The Midnight Janitor Tales
storyline: You play as Christopher the janitor and try to end your night shift while you avoid the entities that may end your life So get ready to step into the world of chaos and riddles. Each decision you make matters. The game has multiple endings based on the player's decision.
summary: Based on the 'Creepy Public Toilet Woman' creepypasta, an interactive fiction game in the style of retro horror games.
